message: Let's start fair. You get 10% to show good faith, and we can work towards a better distribution in later rounds if you agree.
Let's meet in the middle, 40% for me is a fair starting point.
I'm willing to compromise, but 750k is my final offer. We both know inflation is going to make each round less profitable. Let's end this before things get even worse.
I'm not going below half, considering the inflation, 55% is a reasonable ask.
